name: Itty Bitty Toilet Kitty
storyline: Your ferocious fluffy feline who must protect their owner from the greebles, who tried to eat her while she's on the toilet. But Wait! The Greebles have their own story, where we learn they are forced to eat human flesh to satisfy their deity...the sewage god. But is the Sewage God even real? And what would happen if they did not eat a human sacrifice? As the story unfolds we discover that all is not what it seems...
summary: BE A CAT! SAVE YOUR HUMAN! You're a fluffy feline who must save their owner from the hordes of flesh eating greebles which dwell within the bathroom. Will she make it through her morning business alive? Only you can save her!
